Title: Snow White: The Fairest of Them All
Writer: Jacob Grimm (story), Wilhelm Grimm (story), Caroline Thompson (teleplay), Julie Hickson (teleplay)
Actors: Miranda Richardson, Tom Irwin, Vera Farmiga, Kristin Kreuk
Plot: Snow White's mother dies during childbirth, leaving baby Snow and father John for dead on an icy field, who then receives a visit from one of Satan's representatives, granting him three wishes.
